title: Ultimate Bravery?

embed.description: Ultimate Bravery is a way to play League of Legends. You will be given a randomized hero, spells and items, to make your games more spicy! Be brave! Join the Ultimate Bravery challenge!

body:
Hiya

Well just got introduced to this website, it's hilarious!
You're told what to build and what to max first, after that it's got to be either pure luck / your skills to win the match you're most likely about to feed xD

Oh and if you didn't notice, your given your champ to play, so yeah.
~~(Note: don't try this when you're a low lvl)~~ <------------ Ignore this if you don't give a crap
IF YOU TRY THIS PLEASE POST RESULTS ON THIS DISCUSSION!!!

replies.body:
After occult, only died once, BARD OP (P.s. did this like 2 weeks ago)

http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/ub.php?data=dbb_6V1i7qBd40biaiGhDrf7leo0k49KH_6jsWUl4XkDdqQaSqdgpF1sZiDkRJSosr8JiKLKjrSZICWLAEX66g

7/3/24
After you do this once. You will hate your life and probably be in a bad mood for the rest of the day :D!
